de.esoco.entity

Class EntityFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.entity.EntityFunctions

  • public class EntityFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains factory method for entity-specific instances of Function.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EntityFunctions.GetExtraAttribute<E extends Entity,V>
      An element accessor that returns the value of a certain extra attribute from an entity input value.

    • Method Detail

      • entityToString

        public static de.esoco.lib.expression.InvertibleFunction<Entity,java.lang.String> entityToString()
        Returns an invertible function that can convert an entity into a string and vice versa. The string representation of a entity will be it's global entity ID as returned by EntityManager.getGlobalEntityId(Entity). When the function is inverted the entity will be queried through the method EntityManager.queryEntity(String). If that causes an error a FunctionException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        The entity string conversion function

      • format

        public static java.lang.String format(Entity rEntity)
        Format an entity with a default instance of EntityFormat.
        Parameters:
        rEntity - The entity to format
        Returns:
        The resulting string or NULL, if the input entity is NULL

      • formatEntity

        public static <E extends Entity> de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<E,java.lang.String> formatEntity(java.lang.String sNullString)
        Returns a function that formats an entity into a readable string.
        Parameters:
        sNullString - The string to be displayed if the input entity is NULL
        Returns:
        The function for the string formatting

      • formatExtraAttributes

        public static java.lang.String formatExtraAttributes(Entity rEntity)
                                              throws de.esoco.storage.StorageException
        Creates a string for a formatted display of an entity's extra attributes.
        Parameters:
        rEntity - The entity
        Returns:
        The resulting string
        Throws:
        de.esoco.storage.StorageException - If accessing the extra attributes fails

      • getEntityId

        public static <E extends Entity> de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<E,java.lang.Number> getEntityId()
        Returns a static function that returns the ID of a certain entity.
        Returns:
        A static function instance

      • getExtraAttribute

        public static <E extends Entity,V> EntityFunctions.GetExtraAttribute<E,V> getExtraAttribute(org.obrel.core.RelationType<V> rKey,
                                                                                            V rDefaultValue)
        Returns a new function that retrieves a certain extra attribute from it's input entity.
        Parameters:
        rKey - The extra attribute key
        rDefaultValue - The default value if the attribute doesn't exist
        Returns:
        A new binary function instance

      • getExtraAttributeValue

        public static <T> de.esoco.lib.expression.BinaryFunction<ExtraAttribute,org.obrel.core.RelationType<T>,T> getExtraAttributeValue(org.obrel.core.RelationType<T> rExtraAttributeKey)
        Returns a new function that returns the correctly typed value of an extra attribute with a certain key. If the key of the evaluated extra attribute doesn't match the argument key an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown from the function evaluation.
        Parameters:
        rExtraAttributeKey - The extra attribute key
        Returns:
        A new binary function instance

      • getGlobalEntityId

        public static <E extends Entity> de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<E,java.lang.String> getGlobalEntityId()
        Returns a static function that returns the global ID of a certain entity.
        Returns:
        A static function instance

      • getUpwards

        public static <E extends Entity,T> de.esoco.lib.expression.BinaryFunction<E,org.obrel.core.RelationType<T>,T> getUpwards(org.obrel.core.RelationType<T> rAttribute)
        Returns a function that returns an entity attribute from the entity's hierarchy.
        See Also:
        Entity.getUpwards(RelationType)

      • queryEntity

        public static de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<java.lang.String,Entity> queryEntity()
        Returns a new function that queries an entity with a certain global ID.
        See Also:
        EntityManager.queryEntity(String)

      • queryEntity

        public static <E extends Entity> de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<java.lang.Number,E> queryEntity(java.lang.Class<E> rEntityClass)
        Returns a new function that queries an entity of a certain type with a particular ID.
        See Also:
        EntityManager.queryEntity(Class, long)

      • queryEntity

        public static <E extends Entity> de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<java.lang.Object,E> queryEntity(java.lang.Class<E> rEntityClass,
                                                                                                  de.esoco.lib.expression.Predicate<? super E> rCriteria,
                                                                                                  boolean bFailOnMultiple)
        Returns a new function which queries an entity that matches certain criteria. The input value of the function will be ignored.
        See Also:
        EntityManager.queryEntity(Class, Predicate, boolean)

      • queryEntity

        public static <T,E extends Entity> de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<T,E> queryEntity(java.lang.Class<E> rEntityClass,
                                                                                     org.obrel.core.RelationType<T> rAttribute,
                                                                                     de.esoco.lib.expression.Predicate<? super E> rAdditionalCriteria,
                                                                                     boolean bFailOnMultiple)
        Returns a new function that queries an entity with a certain attribute value.
        Parameters:
        rEntityClass - The entity type to query
        rAttribute - The attribute to search for
        rAdditionalCriteria - Optional additional criteria or NULL for none
        bFailOnMultiple - If TRUE the call fails if multiple entities are found for the given criteria
        Returns:
        A new function instance

      • storeEntity

        public static <E extends Entity> de.esoco.lib.expression.Action<E> storeEntity()
        Returns a static function instance that stores the entity it receives as the input value. The input entity will then be returned as the output value to allow function chaining.
        Returns:
        A static function instance that stores an entity
